# normalization.text_normalizer { #easyaligner.text.normalization.text_normalizer }

```python
text.normalization.text_normalizer(text)
```

Default text normalization function.

Applies
    - Unicode normalization (NFKC)
    - Lowercasing
    - Normalization of whitespace
    - Remove parentheses and special characters

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

+--------+--------+---------------+------------+
| Name   | Type   | Description   | Default    |
+========+========+===============+============+
| text   | str    | Input text.   | _required_ |
+--------+--------+---------------+------------+

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

+--------+--------------+-------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type         | Description                                     |
+========+==============+=================================================+
|        | list of str  | List of normalized tokens.                      |
+--------+--------------+-------------------------------------------------+
|        | list of dict | Mapping between tokens and original text spans. |
+--------+--------------+-------------------------------------------------+
